text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Americans don't want a parade, or airshow that our tax dollars pay for! We want to be able to have good healthcare, our jobs, but we can't because you won't protect the USA from #COVID19 ravaging our nation! We need testing & PPE! DO YOUR JOB! #TrumpVirus 
https://t.co/zSVx4mo05i
